qas.question: What is the population of Bern?
What percent of the population are resident foreign nationals?
What was the population change from 2000 and 2010?
What counted for more of the population change?

context: Bern has a population of <a0_0>140,634<a0_0/> people and <a1_0>34%<a1_0/> of the population are resident foreign nationals. Over the 10 years between 2000 and 2010, the population changed at a rate of 0<a2_0>.6%<a2_0/>. Migration accounted for 1.3%, while <a3_0>births and deaths<a3_0/> accounted for −2.1%.
